name: FROST (itch) (Ape in the tree)
description:
this is my submision to the firith studio's gamejam.

thank's to shellby for making all the art we worked together and go check him out: https://scratch.mit.edu/users/Tortol/

Frost is mostly a puzzler and since I am very bad at puzzle's especially at making them this will not be the hardest nut to crack if you want to try it check it out.

watch out!!!!!

the stop button is sized weirdly making it easy to exedentally press it, make sure you press the button you inted to press when pressing a button.
